highlands.title: FROM THE HIGHLANDS
highlands.subtitle: The timeless elegance of the Highlands
highlands.content: Discover our collection of furniture inspired by the majestic Hautes Lands of Scotland. Each piece is meticulously crafted to combine beauty and sustainability, reflecting the very essence of this mythical region.
highlands.content2: Find high-quality bedroom, kitchen, and bathroom furniture on our e-commerce site. From the cozy bed to the functional kitchen and elegant bathroom furniture, create practical and aesthetic spaces for every room in your home.

Product.title: OUR PRODUCTS
category.description: The kitchen is a specific room in a building, especially equipped for the preparation of food and dishes. We have there usually running water and various household appliances (stove, oven, refrigerator...).
